casebody.data:
Theodore CREED
v.
William E. CREED, Nationwide Property & Casualty Insurance Company, Inc., Essentia Insurance Company, and Owners Insurance Company No. 109P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 William C. Robinson, Attorney at Law, Dorothy M. Gooding, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Nationwide Property & Casualty Insurance Company, Inc. Andrew J. Schwaba, Attorney at Law, for Creed, Theodore.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th of April 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
